org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.item

Interface ItemItemModelBackedGlobalScorer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GlobalItemScorer

    @DefaultImplementation(value=ItemItemGlobalScorer.class)
public interface ItemItemModelBackedGlobalScorer
extends GlobalItemScorer
    The global scorer for the global recommendation backed by a item-item model.
